reviewText: this was an amazing deal. took me back to when I first moved away from home and all the concerts I stood in line for. Just a good time to enjoy the great music and then of course the movies
I GOT THE PURPLE RAIN/AND FRAME ON DVD FRAM WORK GREAT,BUT PURPLE RAIN WAS VERY SCRATCH UP I PLAYED IT BUT KEPT FROZEN UP AND SKIP REALLY BAD IN THE MIDDLE

Haven't watched "Purple Rain" yet on this DVD set, but I have TRIED to watch "Fame" and I was unable to finish the movie due to a glitch on the disk. I am a fan of both movies though!! The music and dancing makes you want to get up and join in on the excitment!!
Dance & sing....those are two things I can't do. But I enjoyed watching both of these movies. The quality and price was the bomb. I will definitely be ordering again.

Purple Rain was by far the biggest influence on me when I was coming of age. What better way to learn the in's and out's of sex and relationships than from the master. Prince demonstrates his firm command and understanding of the opposite sex. Everything I learned I learned from this film. How do be esoteric, sexual, ego driven, reclusive, aggressive, artistic and withdrawn all at the same time. I have since found that women really respond to such a collection of emotions.

Fame was about a boarding school in New York City that catered to teenagers with delusions of becoming famous. Frankly dealt with teenage pregnancy and the value of friendship.

I was happy to get 2 of my favorite old movies on one DVD. The music in both is really great which is pretty much what I remembered about Fame. The acting was ok in Fame, not how I remembered it from when I was a kid and it came out ...Back then I thought it was the best movie ever made :-)When I saw that they were doing a remake of it, I could not understand why since the original was so great! Now looking at it with older eyes, I see how dated it is and look forward to seeing the new version. I even rented the TV show which also I thought was so great when I was a kid and found it to be pretty lame now :-)I guess our tastes change as we grow up...
Purple Rain is one of those movies that is just filled with so much great music that I will always love it. I have watched it probably a couple dozen times since it came out, and while the story is kind of dumb, the music is brilliant :-)I don't think Prince has done anything near as good since then...

I got this two-movie CD for my wife.  The bottom line is, if she's happy, I'm happy.  These are not my favorite movies by a long shot, but they are produced well, and I think we got a very good transfer to the digital format.  They just ain't my cup o' tea, but, like I said, my wife's all over them, so there's happiness in the household.  Five stars from my better half.  I would give them three stars for having both movies on a single disc.
The service was fast and came to me in great condition.  I highly recommend this seller.
gift
I loved it
Two classics. Glad to have them in my collection.
Uh, it's Purple Rain and Fame...what's not to love?
Awesome
Prince can't go wrong - working on my fan collection

I miss knowing he is somewhere on earth. Anything by him usually doesn't disappoint. Excellent!

Purple Rain is OK but what did anyone see in Fame except for the one song?  In Fame, they took what looks like a bunch of losers from acting school and put them together in this mess of a movie.  What a waste, I couldn't even watch the whole thing is got so stupid and boring that I had to start fast forwarding the thing to get done.  Don't waste your money, if you like the spng download it.
Brought back great memories.
Love this movie i had to order it again my mom had came to visit for few days and she took my first dvd of purple rain so i had to re order lol
Ordered this the day we lost Prince. RIP Purple Prince. Hubby had never seen it. My daughter took my copy when she moved so this was a replacement. Will always be one of my favorite movies.

Quick delivery! Can't wait to watch some purple rain.. thank you!

Great movie.

I'm still grieving over Price's death 2 months later. I am interested in anything about his life or photos new to me. Nothing compared 2 U Prince! I luv your kindness to animals being a vegan & the musical genius that you are. Purple Rain was a musical masterpiece! Your legacy will live on forever!
I love Purple Rain but wish I had bought it by itself, hadn't seen Fame in years and I DON'T like it

Loved it

My favorite movie of all time! I purchased Purple Rain for myself and also purchased another for a co-worker that loves Prince. I could watch this movie once a week and never get tired of it. I will definitely miss Prince. I did not have any issues with this DVD and it played well.
I love it so much
awesome
Prince Tribute, plus my favorite show as a little girl...BONUS!!!

The description said nothing about the Purple Rain disc being Full Frame.  Had to get a credit for this one.

BUYER BEWARE.  Fame is in widescreen, Purple Rain is not.
This was a birthday gift.  Getting it fast was great.  No problem.  It was there on the date .
Excellent!!
Amazingly boring movie.  Fell asleep three times.

I was surprised at how well Purple Rain held up over time.  The music is still great.  The story is is fine.  The clothes from the film were never mainstream anyway, so they did not feel dated.  The only things which sort of aged the film were the hairstyles.  I wanted to share this with my kids who have an aversion to "old" movies.  This worked quite nicely.  :)
Nice.
Good...
Good deal/price for these two classics.
Classics!  I was happy to find these to add to my collection.

Two classic 80's flicks at a good price. Great music in these two movies. If you love Prince, Irene Cara, and the 80's, buy this! I just have a few thoughts to share about the way this dvd was packaged/shipped -- I ordered this item with a heavy 5-pound jug of protein powder and when I opened the box there was no bubble wrap protecting the dvd from this 5-pound jug. The dvd case was flattened like it had a run-in with a steamroller. Boo, to whoever packaged -- or lack of it -- my dvd's.
Good
Classics.  Go watch them.
love it
1st time watching Fame. Enjoyed it! Loved Purple Rain back when it 1st came out.

Cheaper than buying Purple Rain alone. I had never seen Fame and it was just okay, but the fact that I got purple rain for cheaper packaged with this other movie made it worth it!

I love this movie!!!!
I am a big Prince and Irene Cara fan!
2 classic films in one. Great deal. Well worth the price. Just can't forget how talented Prince is. A little weird but so what

This movie brings back memories of my childhood. It is one that is unique in nature. Although prince is a controversial artist. He is unique in his style. Plus this movie gives a lot of laughs along with tears.
This is one of my favorite my movies.  Received item in a timely fashion.  Enjoy the movie and is a great addition to my collection.

I realize that FAME is rated R but I had no idea when I purchased it that it contained the F word over and over and over, kids cussing at their teachers, busting up glass trophy cases, etc. I've watched many R rated movies so I expected some bad language but this one caught me off guard. I thought I was buying a movie with a lot of music and dancing...a fun movie. I'm used to movies with foul language but geez....Aside from the language, it's just not a good movie. Actually, in my opinion, it's a really bad movie. I would have just turned it off and quite watching it (which I considered repeatedly throughout the movie) but I just kept thinking it had to get better. I'm perplexed as to how FAME became so popular. It must be from the 2009 version, which I haven't seen. Fame came bundled with Purple Rain which I haven't yet watched so I have no opinion on it.

When I received the disk and examine the box, I noticed that the "Proof of Purchase" barcode had been defaced; it looked like someone had taken an Xacto knife and cut through it.

When I opened the jewel case, I was NOT prepared to find a disk with no marking on it whatsoever, as bare as the blanks I use to back up my photography. No legitimate vendor would sell such an item.

I did not expect, when dealing with Amazon, or an Amazon associate, to be worried about the legitimacy of the product I purchased.

Please advise what steps have been taken to ensure that Amazon no longer provides a market from which pirates may offer their ill-gotten products.

Thank you.
All I can say is great combo
